description.narrative: The Project Development Objective of the Agricultural Productivity and Diversification Project (PADA) is to restore and improve productivity and value addition for selected value chains in the Recipient's territory.

participating-org.narrative: Ministere de l'Agriculture de l'Elevage de la Peche (MAEP)

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :Accounting software. Schedule 2 Section II. B (7) | Description :The Recipient shall no later than (3) threemonths of Effective Date update and thereafter maintain the accounting software in a manner acceptable to the Association, for theProject.Configure existing version of the accounting software to reflect the AF | Due Date :14-Dec-2017
Finance Agreement :Article IV, Section 4.01 (a) | Description :The Recipient has adopted the Project Implementation Manual | DueDate :15-Mar-2012
Finance Agreement :Article IV, Section 4.01 (b) | Description :The Recipient has established the Steering Committee | Due Date:15-Mar-2012

Finance Agreement :Article IV, Section 4.01 (c) | Description :The Recipient has recruited, for the PMU (i) Project Coordinator;(ii) Procurement specialist; (iii) Rural finance specialist; (iv)Value chain development specialist | Due Date :15-Mar-2012

Finance Agreement :Article IV, Section 4.01 (d) | Description :The GFRP Grant Agreement has been executed and delivered and allconditions of effectiveness met or the withdrawal conditions fulfilled | Due Date :15-Mar-2012
Finance Agreement :Article IV, Section 4.01 (e) | Description :The Recipient shall have (i) opened the Project account, and (ii)deposited the Initial Deposit therein. | Due Date :15-Mar-2012

Finance Agreement :External auditor. Schedule 2 Section II. B (6) | Description :The Recipient shall no later than (3) three monthsof Effective Date recruit and thereafter maintain, an external auditor, with experience and terms of reference acceptable to theAssociation.Recruit and maintain an external auditor | Due Date :14-Dec-2017

Finance Agreement :Financial controller. Schedule 2 Section II. B (5) | Description :The Recipient shall no later than (3) threemonths of Effective Date recruit and thereafter maintain, a financial controller, with experience and terms of reference acceptableto the Association | Due Date :14-Dec-2017

Finance Agreement :Project Management Unit staffing. Schedule 2 Section I. A (3) (c) | Description :Without limitation to theprovisions of paragraph (a) above, the PMU shall be headed by a Project coordinator, who shall be assisted by the team comprisedunder the Original Financing Agreement, in addition to recruiting no later than 3 (three) months all the additional staff specifiedin the FA. | Due Date :14-Dec-2017

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2 Section I. E (1) | Description :The Recipient shall update no later than one (1) month after theEffective Date, in accordance with terms of reference acceptable to the Association, the Project Implementation Manual preparedunder the Original Project.Update Project Implementation Manual (PIM) | Due Date :14-Oct-2017

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, F-3 | Description :The Recipient shall deposit an initial amount of (or equivalent to ) FCFA300,000,000 or such amount as agreed with the Associationinto the Project Account as part of required counterpart funds | Due Date:15-Mar-2012

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, F-4 | Description :The Recipient shall deposit in the Project Account as part of the CounterpartFunds an amount equivalent to not less than US$375,000 or such other amount as agreed by the Association. | Frequency :Quarterly

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, Section 1, A (4) (a) | Description :The Recipient shall establish a regional steering committee ineach of the relevant regions, with functions and resources satisfactory to the Association | Due Date :15-Mar-2012

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, Section 2, B.4 | Description :The Recipient shall appoint an external auditor in accordance with theprovisions of Section III of Schedule 2 of the Financing Agreement | Due Date :15-Mar-2012
